// Upgrade NOTE: replaced 'mul(UNITY_MATRIX_MVP,*)' with 'UnityObjectToClipPos(*)'
// Upgrade NOTE: replaced '_Object2World' with 'unity_ObjectToWorld'
Shader "CS0102/shader"
{
    Properties
    {
        // å¸¸ç”¨çš„äº”ç§æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
        _Float("Float", Float) = 0.0
        _Range("Range", Range(0.0, 1.0)) = 0.0

        _Color("Color", Color) = (0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5)
        //_Texture("Texture", 2D) = "black" {}

    SubShader
    {

            // Shader ä¸»è¦ä»£ç éƒ¨åˆ†
            CGPROGRAM
            #pragma vertex vert // æŒ‡å®šä¸€ä¸ªé¡¶ç‚¹ Shaderï¼švert

            #include "UnityCG.cginc" // å¤´æ–‡ä»¶

            // ä» CPU ç«¯è·å–æ¨¡å‹æ•°æ®
            struct appdata {
                float4 vertex : POSITION;  // æ¨¡å‹é¡¶ç‚¹åæ ‡
                // ç¬¬ä¸€å¥—uvï¼Œå…±4ä¸ªå¯ç”¨ï¼ˆTEXCOORD0~TEXCOORD3ï¼‰
                float2 uv : TEXCOORD0;

            };
            // è¾“å‡ºç»“æ„ä½“å®šä¹‰
            struct v2f {
                float4 pos : SV_POSITION;
                //é€šç”¨å‚¨å­˜å™¨ï¼ˆæ’å€¼å™¨ï¼‰ï¼Œå…±16ä¸ªå¯ç”¨ï¼ˆTEXCOORD0~TEXCOORD15ï¼‰
                float2 uv:TEXCOORD0;
            };
            float4 _Color;
            sampler2D _MainTex;
            float4 _MainTex_ST;//åŠ¨æ€é“¾æ¥å››ä¸ªå‚æ•°
            // é¡¶ç‚¹ Shader
            v2f vert(appdata v) {
                v2f o;
                //float4 pos_world = mul(unity_ObjectToWorld, v.vertex); // æ¨¡å‹ç©ºé—´è½¬ä¸–ç•Œç©ºé—´
                //float4 pos_clip = mul(UNITY_MATRIX_VP, pos_world); // ä¸–ç•Œç©ºé—´ç›´æ¥å˜æ¢åˆ°è£å‰ªç©ºé—´
                //o.pos = pos_clip;
                //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥åˆæˆä¸€ä¸ªmvpæ“ä½œ
                o.pos=UnityObjectToClipPos(v.vertex);
                //è¾“å‡ºuvå€¼
                //o.uv=v.uv;
                o.uv=v.uv*_MainTex_ST.xy+_MainTex_ST.zw;
                return o;
            }
            // ç‰‡å…ƒ Shader
            float4 frag(v2f i) : SV_Target {
                //è´´å›¾é‡‡æ ·
                float4 col=tex2D(_MainTex,i.uv);

            }
            ENDCG

    void swap(vector<int>& nums,int i,int j){
        int t;
        t=nums[i];
        nums[i]=nums[j];
        nums[j]=t;
        
    }
    void moveZeroes(vector<int>& nums) {
        int i=0; 
        for(int j=0;j<nums.size();j++){
            if(nums[j]!=0){
                swap(nums,i,j);
                i++;
            }
        }

    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> plusOne(vector<int>& digits) {
        int len=digits.size();
        if(digits[len-1]!=9){
            digits[len-1]+=1;
        }
        else{
            int cnt=0;//è®°å½•9å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªé9å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸‹æ ‡å³ä¸ºlen-cnt-1
            for(int i=len-1;i>=0;i--){
                if(digits[i]==9){
                    cnt++;
                }
                else{
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(cnt==len){
                digits.insert(digits.begin(),1);
                for(int i=1;i<len+1;i++){
                    digits[i]=0;
                }
            }
            else{
                int index=len-cnt-1;
                digits[index]+=1;
                for(int i=index+1;i<len;i++){
                    digits[i]=0;
                }
            }
        }
        return digits;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool isMonotonic(vector<int>& nums) {
        bool increase=true,decrease=true;
        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++){
            if(nums[i+1] > nums[i]){
                decrease=false;
            }
            if(nums[i+1] < nums[i]){
                increase=false;
            }
        }
        return decrease || increase;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    unordered_map<char,int>mymap={
        {'I',1},
        {'V',5},
        {'X',10},
        {'L',50},
        {'C',100},
        {'D',500},
        {'M',1000},
    };
    int romanToInt(string s) {
        int ans=0;
        int len=s.length();
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
            if(mymap[s[i]]<mymap[s[i+1]]){
                ans-=mymap[s[i]];
            }
            else{
                ans+=mymap[s[i]];
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int lengthOfLastWord(string s) {
        int len=s.length();
        int m=0,n=0;
        for(int i=len-1;i>0;i--){
            if(s[i]!=' ' && (s[i+1]==' ' || s[i+1]=='\0')){
                m=i;
            }
            if((s[i-1]==' ' || s[i-1]=='\0') && s[i]!=' '){
                n=i;
                break;
            }
        }
        return m-n+1;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int lengthOfLastWord(string s) {
        int len=s.length();
        int ans=0;
        int i=len-1;
        while(i>=0 && s[i]==' '){
            i--;
        }
        while(i>=0 && s[i]!=' '){
            ans++;
            i--;
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool isPalindrome(int x) {
        if(x<0 || (x%10==0 && x!=0)){
            return false;
        }
        int num=0;
        while(x>num){
            num=num*10+x%10;
            x/=10;
        }
        return x==num || x==num/10;
    }
};

        int len=strs[0].size();
        int cnt=strs.size();
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
            char c=strs[0][i];
            for(int j=1;j<cnt;j++){
                if(i==strs[j].size() || strs[j][i]!=c){
                    return strs[0].substr(0,i);
                }
            }
        }
        return strs[0];
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int calPoints(vector<string>& operations) {
        vector<int>ans;
        for(string ch:operations){
            if(ch=="+"){
                ans.push_back(ans[ans.size()-1]+ans[ans.size()-2]);
            }
            else if(ch=="D"){
                ans.push_back(ans.back()*2);
            }
            else if(ch=="C"){
                ans.pop_back();
            }
            else{
                ans.push_back(stoi(ch));
            }
        }
        return accumulate(ans.begin(),ans.end(),0);
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int searchInsert(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        while(nums.size()!=1){
            if(target<nums[0]){
                return 0;
            }
            for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++){
                if(nums[i]==target){
                    return i;
                }
                else if(nums[i]<target && nums[i+1]>=target){
                    return i+1;
                }
            }
            return nums.size();
        }
        return (target<=nums[0])? 0:1;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int searchInsert(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int left,right;
        left=0;
        right=nums.size()-1;
        while(left<=right){
            int mid=left+(right-left)/2;
            if(nums[mid]==target){
                return mid;
            }
            else if(nums[mid]<target){
                left=mid+1;
            }
            else{
                right=mid-1;
            }
        }
        return left;
    }
};
